parameters.name: AcrRegistryInfo
parameters.description: Information about the Container Registry Enterprise Edition instance.

parameters.name: ActiveDeadlineSeconds
parameters.description: The validity period of the scaling configuration. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: AutoCreateEip
parameters.description: Specifies whether to automatically create an elastic IP address (EIP), and then bind the EIP to the elastic container instance.

parameters.name: AutoMatchImageCache
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically match the image cache. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: Container
parameters.description: The minimum number of consecutive successes before a failed probe is considered successful. Default value: 1. Valid value: 1.

parameters.name: ContainerGroupName
parameters.description:
The name of the elastic container instance. The name must meet the following requirements:

*   The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length.
*   The name can contain only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). The name cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

parameters.name: ContainersUpdateType
parameters.description:
The update mode of containers. Valid values:

- RenewUpdate: full update mode. This value takes effect based on the value of the Containers parameters in an update request. This value indicates that the previous setting of the Containers parameter is overwritten.
- IncrementalUpdate: incremental update mode. The value of the Containers parameter varies based on the value of the Containers.Name parameter. This value indicates that only the settings of the specified request parameters are updated.

Default value: RenewUpdate.

parameters.name: CostOptimization
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the cost optimization feature. Valid values:

- true
- false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: Cpu
parameters.description: The number of vCPUs of the elastic container instance.

parameters.name: CpuOptionsCore
parameters.description: The number of physical CPU cores. You can specify this parameter only for specific instance types. For more information, see [Customize CPU options](~~197781~~).

parameters.name: CpuOptionsThreadsPerCore
parameters.description: The number of threads per core. You can specify this parameter only for specific instance types. If you set this parameter to 1, Hyper-Threading is disabled. For more information, see [Customize CPU options](~~197781~~).

parameters.name: DnsConfigNameServer
parameters.description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers.

parameters.name: DnsConfigOption
parameters.description: The options. Each option is a name-value pair. The value in the name-value pair is optional.

parameters.name: DnsConfigSearch
parameters.description: The DNS lookup domains.

parameters.name: DnsPolicy
parameters.description:
The Domain Name System (DNS) policy. Valid values:

*   None: uses the DNS that is specified for the DnsConfig field.
*   Default: uses the DNS that is specified for the runtime environment.

parameters.name: EgressBandwidth
parameters.description: The maximum outbound bandwidth. Unit: bit/s.

parameters.name: EipBandwidth
parameters.description:
The bandwidth of the EIP.

Default value: 5. Unit: Mbit/s.

parameters.name: EphemeralStorage
parameters.description: The size of the temporary storage space. By default, an enhanced SSD (ESSD) of the PL1 level is used. Unit: GiB.

parameters.name: HostAliase
parameters.description: Information about the hosts.

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.description: The hostname of the elastic container instance.

parameters.name: ImageRegistryCredential
parameters.description: Information about the image repository.

parameters.name: ImageSnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the image cache snapshot.

parameters.name: IngressBandwidth
parameters.description: The maximum inbound bandwidth. Unit: bit/s.

parameters.name: InitContainer
parameters.description: The init containers.

parameters.name: InstanceFamilyLevel
parameters.description:
The level of the instance type, which is used to filter the instance types that meet the specified criteria. This parameter takes effect only if you set the `CostOptimization` parameter to true. Valid values:

*   EntryLevel: shared instance type. Instances of this level are the most cost-effective but may not provide stable computing performance in a consistent manner. Instances of this level are suitable for business scenarios in which the CPU utilization is low. For more information, see [Shared instance families](~~108489~~).
*   EnterpriseLevel: Instances of this level provide stable performance and dedicated resources, and are suitable for business scenarios that require high stability. For more information, see [Instance family](~~25378~~).
*   CreditEntryLevel: This value is valid only for burstable instances. CPU credits are used to ensure computing performance. Instances of this level are suitable for scenarios in which the CPU utilization is low but may fluctuate in specific cases. For more information, see the [Overview](~~59977~~) topic of burstable instances.

parameters.name: Ipv6AddressCount
parameters.description: The number of IPv6 addresses.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerWeight
parameters.description: The weight of the elastic container instance as a backend server. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: Memory
parameters.description: The memory size of the elastic container instance. Unit: GiB.

parameters.name: NtpServer
parameters.description: The domain names of the NTP server.

parameters.name: RamRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM role of the instance. You can use a RAM role to access elastic container instances and Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. For more information, see [Use an instance RAM role by calling API operations](~~61178~~).

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: RestartPolicy
parameters.description:
The restart policy of the elastic container instance. Valid values:

*   Always: always restarts the elastic container instance.
*   Never: never restarts the elastic container instance.
*   OnFailure: restarts the elastic container instance upon failures.

Default value: Always.

parameters.name: ScalingConfigurationId
parameters.description: The ID of the scaling configuration that you want to modify.

parameters.name: ScalingConfigurationName
parameters.description:
The name of the scaling configuration. The name must be 2 to 64 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), hyphens (-), and periods (.). The name must start with a letter or a digit.

The name of the scaling configuration must be unique within a scaling group in a region. If you do not specify this parameter, the value of the ScalingConfigurationId parameter is used.

parameters.name: SecurityContextSysctl
parameters.description: The system information of the security context in which the elastic container instance runs.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the security group with which you want to associate the elastic container instance. Elastic container instances that are associated with the same security group can communicate with each other.

If you do not specify a security group, the system uses the default security group in the region that you select. Make sure that the inbound rules of the security group contain the protocols and the port numbers of the containers that you want to expose. If you do not have a default security group in the region, the system automatically creates a default security group and adds the declared container protocols and port numbers to the inbound rules of the security group.

parameters.name: SpotPriceLimit
parameters.description:
The maximum hourly price of the preemptible elastic container instance. The value can be accurate to three decimal places.

If you set the SpotStrategy parameter to SpotWithPriceLimit, you must specify the SpotPriceLimit parameter.

parameters.name: SpotStrategy
parameters.description:
The bidding policy of the elastic container instance. Valid values:

*   NoSpot: The instance is created as a pay-as-you-go instance.
*   SpotWithPriceLimit: The instance is a preemptible instance that has a user-defined maximum hourly price.
*   SpotAsPriceGo: The instance is a preemptible instance for which the market price at the time of purchase is used as the bid price.

Default value: NoSpot.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: Information about the tags.

parameters.name: TerminationGracePeriodSeconds
parameters.description: The buffer time during which the program handles operations before the program stops. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Volume
parameters.description: Information about the volumes.
